articles.title: The gap between AI hype and newsroom reality
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: Although AI is changing the media, how much it's changing journalism is unclear. Most editorial policies forbid using AI to help write stories, and journalists don't want the help anyway. Even if you never publish a single word of AI-generated text, it's still valuable.
